message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a limited time. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm willing to part with it for $10,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something a little closer to my original price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $9,000. Could we perhaps discuss a price closer to my maximum of $8,000?
